body_html:
You should not clone the caffe2 git repository from https://github.com/caffe2/caffe2/ because the code moved to pytorch. See: caffe2/caffe2@a062b05.

Instead, clone the one from https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/.

Like this:

$ git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git
body_text:
You should not clone the caffe2 git repository from https://github.com/caffe2/caffe2/ because the code moved to pytorch. See: caffe2/caffe2@a062b05.
Instead, clone the one from https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/.
Like this:
$ git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git
body:
You should not clone the caffe2 git repository from https://github.com/caffe2/caffe2/ because the code moved to pytorch. See: https://github.com/caffe2/caffe2/commit/a062b05d70c75a6005c6e76109a1dde482729a53.

Instead, clone the one from https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/.

Like this:

```
$ git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git
```
